alert.note: Alert for Berks; Delaware; Eastern Chester; Western Chester; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:37AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New Castle, northwestern Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s, Kent, western Salem, south central Berks, Chester and southwestern Delaware Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 635 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mountville to near Rock Springs to Rosedale. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Dover, Newark, Middletown, West Chester, Phoenixville, Pennsville, Coatesville, Westtown, Smyrna, Carneys Point, Downingtown, Elsmere, Kennett Square, New Castle, Chestertown, Penns Grove, Salem, Oxford and Parkesburg. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 1. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 296 and 324. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 8. Interstate 176 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Berks; Delaware; Eastern Chester; Western Chester; Western Montgomery
